officialTitle: Group Compassion Focused Therapy for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder
inclusionCriteria:
* Clinical Administered PTSD Scale 5 Monthly version Criteria A and \>30 points
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Suicidal patients and/or severe automutilation behavior and/or psychotic symptoms and/or lack of event memory.
